Title: Requires the state to provide reimbursement of certain costs and benefits incurred as a result of an injury occurring during a mutual aid call
Summary: Requires the state to provide reimbursement of certain costs and benefits incurred as a result of an injury occurring during a mutual aid call.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Work Comp L; amd ยง30, Vol Ffs Ben L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law and the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, in relation to requiring the state to provide reimbursement of certain costs and benefits incurred as a result of an injury occurring during a mutual aid call
